description: A tunic made for use in the Gallian army. It's famous blue appearance is quite distinctive, and does much to instill a sense of hope in the citizens of Gallia.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

A fabric ammo pouch that can be strapped to your chest which is capable of holding a single magazine close at hand. Commonly seen in use among gallian stormtroopers.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A piece of gallian armor with a few metal plates that are affixed near wearer's shoulders and upper shoulder.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

A tunic made for use in the East Europan Imperial Alliance. It's famous blue appearance is quite distinctive, and does much to instill a sense of hope in the citizens of Gallia.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

A fabric ammo pouch that can be strapped to your chest which is capable of holding a single magazine close at hand. Commonly seen in use among Imperial stormtroopers.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

Perhaps the most famous piece of Imperial military equipment besides the ZM MP, the Model 1931 Imperial chestplate has served as an often burdensome reminder of Imperial might. The chestplate, being made nearly completely of steel, is often very cumbersome, but affords its user with nearly unmatched protection.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

name.str_sp: XL Gallian P.34 Women's Scout Jacket

description: A tunic made for use in the Gallian army. It's famous blue appearance is quite distinctive, and does much to instill a sense of hope in the citizens of Gallia. Made specifically for use with women, as seen by its slimmer cut that better suits the form of a woman.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

A tunic made for use in the various Gallian civilian militia units around the country. It's essentially just a short dress made in the national Gallian colors, but is very easy to move around in..  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A small leather backpack designed for use in the Gallian military.  Good storage for a little encumbrance.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A small leather backpack designed for use in the Imperial military. A modified version of an old rucksack used in the first Europan War.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
An cotton dress most commonly worn by the women of Gallia's cities and villages.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
